title: TikTok's Favorite Ice Cream Maker Is $111 Off Right Now
description:

title: See the New Comet Nishimura Before It Disappears for More Than 400 Years
description:
The universe is delivering a cosmic gift this week—a newly discovered comet will zip by earth to say hey before leaving our planetary neighborhood for more than 400 years. The green comet C/2023 P1, or “Nishimura,” is already visible in the predawn sky, but over the weekend it will grow brighter and should be visible…

title: The Best Cold Medicines Aren't in the Cough and Cold Aisle
description:
When you’re feeling awful because of a cold, you just want something to fix you—if not to cure you, at least to help you temporarily feel better. Unfortunately a lot of remedies are placebos, but some things in the drugstore work better than others.

title: Update Your Apple Devices ASAP
description:
It’s time to update your iPhone. No, iOS 17 isn’t here yet (but it will be soon): Instead, the company released important security patches to fix vulnerabilities on your iPhone, iPad, Mac, and even Apple Watch.

title: My Favorite Travel Apps for Booking Flights and Surviving the Airport
description:
Navigating your way through an airport, even for a trip you’re excited to take, nearly always feels like a chore. But I have found that if you have the right tools ready to use, you can actually make the whole experience much more tolerable. Here are some of my favorite travel apps to try out the next time you plan a…

title: This Is the Best Way to Clean Dirty Oven Racks
description:
You’re here because you want to know the best way to clean your oven rack. That makes sense, as there are some zany hacks out there—but they can get so convoluted it’s hard to know if they’re the best way. For instance, a not-insignificant number of people swear by setting oven racks in dewy grass overnight. But what…

title: You Can Get Microsoft Office and Windows 11 Pro for $55 Right Now
description:

title: This Hidden Setting Will Make Your Instagram Pictures Look Better
description:
Your smartphone takes some great pictures—so much so that most of us don’t bother with a dedicated DSLR these days, especially not for the images we upload to Instagram. We know our phone photos are high quality, and that will be reflected in our carefully curated Instagram feeds.

title: This Two-Ingredient Meat Glaze Recipe Is Good on Any Meat
description:

description:
Gamers looking to pick up a new portable gaming machine can save up to $750 on the HP Omen 16 gaming laptop from Best Buy right now. The device typically lists for $1,699.99, but is on sale for just $949.99 as of Sept. 7, 2023.

title: You Should Color Code Your Notes to Remember Them Better
description:
To take the best notes in class, you need a system. There are a lot of great note-taking techniques that can help you identify the key elements of any lesson and organize them in a way that will help you study—but one of the best ways to actually learn and retain what the notes say is by color-coding.

title: How to Get Out of Jury Duty
description:
Few among us are excited to see an envelope in the mail that reads “summons.” Since the jury summons process is designed to be as random as possible, you never know when that dreaded letter may arrive in the mail. Luckily, you might not need to rearrange your schedule just yet. There are practical tools at your…

title: Make 'Fake Risotto' With Leftover Rice
description:
Last night, when I opened my fridge to make dinner, I was confronted with two truths: My leftover rice was getting a little too dry, and my mushrooms had maybe 24 hours before they’d start to get slimy. I had already made a fair amount of fried rice and was craving something creamy. Mushroom risotto sounded just…

description:

title: You Can Make Oatmeal in Your Rice Cooker
description:

It turns out that oatmeal can be easily prepared in most rice cookers. (Provided you have some…

title: Confit Egg Yolks in Olive Oil and Put Them on Everything
description:
It doesn’t take much to convince me that I need egg yolks on my pasta, but I’m a total egg-head. If you need persuading, then allow me: Lightly cooked egg yolks add rich flavor, a custardy texture, and utter decadence to any dish. Indulge yourself in olive oil confit egg yolks.

title: How Long You Should Rest Between Sets
description:
A typical strength- or muscle-building workout happens in sets. You lift the weight a certain number of times (“reps”), then you put it down for a quick rest before going again. But how long should that rest be? The answer will depend on a few factors, including the purpose of the workout.

title: These Are All the Names VASCO Can Call You in ‘Starfield’ (and Some Are Pretty NSFW)
description:

title: The Differences Between Joints, Blunts, and Spliffs
description:
Even though cannabis has a multi-millennia history as a plant used for religion, wellness, and recreation, humans eventually had to mask its existence as prohibition swept the globe—not just the United States. Slang, nicknames, and wordplay have been a part of extralegal activity as long as we’ve had laws.

description:

title: These Are the Hidden Costs of Buying a House
description:

title: The Best Ways to Stay Awake Without Caffeine
description:
Sleep can be frustrating. When you’re desperate to get some much-needed rest, you stare up at the ceiling, so alert you could probably pilot a Moon lander. But when you’re at work or in class and desperately need that level of wakefulness, you find your head nodding and you keep losing time in five-minute increments.

title: What People are Getting Wrong this Week: COVID Vaccine Conspiracies
description:
You could fill a book with dumb things people believe about COVID-19. Unethical actors taking advantage of public fears about a deadly disease is as predictable as it is depressing, and, as infections rates climb from new variants, misinformation and lies are spreading almost as quickly as the virus itself.
